TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtectedBrowserStorage extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides mechanisms for storing and retrieving data in the browser storage.

Docs.param: A value specifying the name of the storage slot to use.

summary.para: Since no data protection purpose is specified with this overload, the purpose is derived from and the store name. This is a good default purpose to use if the keys come from a fixed set known at compile-time.

Docs.returns: A representing the completion of the operation.
